possible_conditions.name: Influenza
possible_conditions.description: A viral infection that attacks respiratory system

possible_conditions.name: Common Cold
possible_conditions.description: A viral infectious disease of the upper respiratory tract

recommendations: Schedule an appointment with your healthcare provider soon
Stay hydrated and get adequate rest
Over-the-counter medications may help with symptoms (consult with pharmacist)

identified_symptoms.name: Fever
identified_symptoms.description: Elevated body temperature above normal range

identified_symptoms.name: Headache
identified_symptoms.description: Pain in the head or upper neck

disclaimer: This is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.
